Summary: myself and three others saw an orb of low flying slow flying light that flew over the house turned into a small red light then disappeared no noise at all
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Elizabeth
There were no other sightings in Elizabeth on or around September 1st 2011
divs: Sighting Detailswe saw an low flying orb of white making no noise at all a plane passed over the top of it leaving from D.I.A as it flew over the top of the house it diminished to a small red light then it was just gone
